mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Employee (emp_no, nm, passwd, email, birth_dt, enter_dt, retire_dt, dept_cd, team_cd, grade_cd, posit_cd, phone_no, addr) VALUES (#{empNo}, #{nm}, #{passwd}, #{email}, #{birthDt}, #{enterDt}, #{retireDt}, #{deptCd}, #{teamCd}, #{gradeCd}, #{positCd}, #{phoneNo}, #{addr})
mapper.select: > SELECT * FROM Employee WHERE emp_no = #{empNo} AND passwd = #{passwd}
